title: MATLAB: A Practical Introduction to... 5th ed 2019 Attaway
description: COVER: http://i.imgur.com/Q0nYn5L.jpg TITLE: MATLAB: A Practical Introduction to Programming and Problem Solving, 5th edition (2019) AUTHOR: Stormy Attaway ISBN-13: 9780128154793 BOOK SPECS: https://www.elsevier.com/books/matlab/attaway/978-0-12-815479-3 FILE SPECS: true PDF, logical page numbers as in the print version, bookmarks, 10 MB READERSHIP: undergraduates in engineering and science taking a course that uses (or recommends) MATLAB; engineers learning to program and model in MATLAB. DESCRIPTION: "MATLAB: A Practical Introduction to Programming and Problem Solving", winner of TAA’s 2017 Textbook Excellence Award ("Texty"), guides the reader through both programming and built-in functions to easily exploit MATLAB's extensive capabilities for tackling engineering and scientific problems. Assuming no knowledge of programming, this book starts with programming concepts, such as variables, assignments, and selection statements, moves on to loops, and then solves problems using both the programming concept and the power of MATLAB. The fifth edition has been updated to reflect the functionality of the current version of MATLAB (R2018a), including the addition of local functions in scripts, the new string type, coverage of recently introduced functions to import data from web sites, and updates to the Live Editor and App Designer. BRIEF CONTENTS: --------------- PART I Introduction to Programming Using MATLAB 1. Introduction to MATLAB 2. Vectors and Matrices 3. Introduction to MATLAB Programming 4. Selection Statements 5. Loop Statements and Vectorizing Code 6. MATLAB Programs 7. String Manipulation 8. Data Structures PART II Advanced Topics for Problem Solving with MATLAB 9. Data Transfer 10. Advanced Functions 11. Introduction to Object-Oriented Programming and Graphics 12. Advanced Plotting Techniques 13. Sights and Sounds 14. Advanced Mathematics appendixes index ********************** 4th ed 2017 ************************ https://btdb.to/torrent/W7Md63z5AVHr9WZXww9ofpgQQjJ1NaiJY9.html
